Reviews.Title: “great location, great service”
Reviews.Author: giorgos e
Reviews.Content: we found the hotel on internet. we were a bit skeptical at the begining, since it was our first trip to Spain, upon arrival all the doubts were gone. we were welcomed by Sandi with a big smile and we knew we were on the right place. very clean room, quiet, staff always with a smile on the face. the location is ideal since its located 50 meters away from Clot metro station. also its a 10 minute walk from la Sagrada familia (just turn left from the entrance of the hotel). next door there is a supermarket for the basics and the street is full of cooffee shops and bakeries. you must try the La paradeta restaurant for the best sea food experiance (behind La Sagrada Familia)

Reviews.Title: “nice and modern hotel.. good price.. terrace!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Katarina_Cali
Reviews.Content: the hotel is new, modern, clean and well-located.. the location is quiet and with good traffic connections to the centre.. (the underground station is just behind the corner).. if you take a nice and not very long walk, you can get to sagrada familia very easily, and still feel the spirit of the city.. you can stop by at the local and typical market.. we were missing only a bar close to the hotel to have some beer after the whole day in the late evening.. (there were some small shops but closing at about midnight or earlier).. anyway, we found another way how to chill, and we spent all the nights at the hotel´s roof terrace watching the night city at the starlight.. it was lovely.. we loved it and had a great time.. the staff were very nice, well-trained and helpful.. breakfast was worth the price but every morning the same.. (we stayed there for 7 nights, so we were annoyed a little).. anyway, another special value of the hotel was that we could eat the breakfast at the terrace next to the restaurant.. we can only recommend the hotel, and we are definately looking forward to coming back..

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Experience”
Reviews.Author: 2cherish
Reviews.Content: Everyone at hotel was helpful. The hotel was clean and centrally located to subway (less than a 5 minute walk). There was a resturant and bakery across the street. Both were reasonably priced and the food was great! A grocery store is next to hotel, you can buy your water at an excellent price. Wifi was great. Would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Great, Modern Hotel just outside the centre”
Reviews.Author: George L
Reviews.Content: We stayed for one night in March and were very impressed by Acta Ink throughout. The room was very comfortable with a wall mounted TV and decent aircon (the one very minor drawback was that the 'double room' came with two singles pushed together) and the bathroom was great with a large, powerful shower. The staff spoke perfect English and were very helpful and friendly. The general design of the hotel is excellent and the view from the roof terrace at sunset was a great surprise.

Reviews.Title: “Such a nice surprise”
Reviews.Author: alex.orange
Reviews.Content: Definitely a nice surprise, if we ever return to Barcelona, we'll probably stay there again. Nice big shower with an interesting glass "overlooking" the room and an extremely comfortable bed. Wifi worked perfectly. Staff was kind and helpful. A bit difficult to find if you are arriving by car but, on weekends, you can park for free in the street.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: anamgarcia
Reviews.Content: The hotel is not in a central location but you have a metro station close and Sagrada Familia is near (15 minutes walking). Near the hotel is a supermarket and several restaurants. The hotel has a very nice design. The room was comfortable, clean and with a good size. Good breakfast. Friendly staff.

Reviews.Title: “Quiet place for good price”
Reviews.Author: Konrad K
Reviews.Content: I was there with wife and small child and for sleep was enough, but for staying there all day - room is too small. Good breakfast. They have even soya milk. Localization to metro station is 5 minutes by walk.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value, Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: GeniusMon
Reviews.Content: Nice design, location is not central but it's alright since it pretty close to a metro stop and to la segrada familia. We were a group of friends staying in Barca for 4 days and we had a good time. Overall, the hotel offerred good value for money which is what we needed.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and handy.”
Reviews.Author: jmowen
Reviews.Content: We stayed in Acta Ink in Barcelona for two nights to go to Camp Nou for a match and explore the city, two adults and two kids. The 'family' room is great but just one room (we had imagined a separate bedroom but this was our assumption rather than advertised). The sofa bed was not that comfy but did fine for the kids for a day or two. The glass window into the bathroom made a shower a fairly public experience for everyone else in the room! The location near Clot subway/train station is brilliant, two stops to the Sagrada Familia and five to the Catalunya main square. Buy a ten ticket pass for good value. You can also get the train to and from the airport to Clot (about 25 minutes and three Euro forty). We booked 'free' breakfast and wifi with our room - this was great value as they charge eight Euro for breakfast and it was good food that set you up for the day and decent coffee. The wifi is fine but you can only have one device connected at a time so that is a pain in an age of ipods, ipads and other devices all wanting wifi. Kind of odd that you also need to give a five euro deposit for the remote so that you can watch TV. All in all, great value. A good location (not a lot around but access to town is easy) and clean, tidy and new. The staff speak English and were very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel design and very cozy!”
Reviews.Author: MelstaCanada
Reviews.Content: This hotel offered everything our group needed in the city... a cozy place to stay in a nicely decorated space for an affordable price!

Reviews.Title: “Nice 3* hotel - Recommended”
Reviews.Author: Katerinaki7
Reviews.Content: Advantages : a block away from the train station (Clot) from/to city center and airport, 5' from the center, 40' from the airport. Free wifi. Clean small rooms. Very helpful and polite stuff. Disadvantages : standard breakfast (but included in the room rate) Overall : nice, modern, standard 3* hotel, if you don't want to pay extremely high prices for the hotels in the center. I would stay again.!

Reviews.Title: “Nice 3* star Hotel, Modern in Good Location”
Reviews.Author: ROULA-THANOS
Reviews.Content: The hotel is 3* and indeed offer a 3* service nothing more or less. Nice modern hotel just open a couple of months Ago and everything is brand new. Room’s size was ok and bathroom as well, modern design of room, with plasma TV but not Fridge in the room which for Summer time maybe a problem. Room was very clean and although located in the front side we did not have Any issues with noise and indeed we have a nice sleep. The breakfast is charged extra at Euro 8 per person and offer what you need to start your day. In any case exactly next door there is supermarket and café shop ( open even on weekends ) where you can have you coffee and pasties or sandwich and same is rather a more economic option. As we arrived the same day when the new reviews were published for the robberies in the Rooms and the lost money we were a bit worried. Upon arrival We have asked the reception which indeed confirm that there were some problems with the last group however still under investigation by police. For us there were not problems and we have used the safe box of the Hotel. Reception staff very helpful and all speak good English. The hotel is in convenient and quite location as the metro stops is 50m away and from there you go easily everywhere you want. We have to agree as well with other reviewers that the negative point is the hot water in the shower as it is very difficult to adjust it and for hot water some times You may have to wait for couple of minutes until to come and then you have to adjust almost all time. Finally we do recommend the hotel as it is in a convenient location, new, clean and value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Our group WAS ROBBED in this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Waldemar66
Reviews.Content: I've been there with travel group Positives: Hotel has quite good location and is clean, breakfast is tasty Negatives: shower - temperature very hard to set, room service starts when you eat breakfast and you have to wait until they finish, elevator is small and you have to wait very long, 4 rooms WERE ROBBED of money

Reviews.Title: “Clean, modern, great price”
Reviews.Author: CourtsNZ
Reviews.Content: Lots of places in Barcelona are very expensive and unfortunately dirty looking. Acta was really nice! Easy to find for mum and I after having gotten off a plane and dealing with pickpockets on the train :-s Front desk was very helpful, room very small but super clean and modern. Shower was often running cold water with random bursts of warm (bothered mum quite a lot). Close to metro, supermarket nearby, great little places to get a beer just outside and near other little attractions. Would stay here again for sure!

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a Hotell.no traveler
Reviews.Content: This is a newly built hotel, so everything was clean. Cleaning lady came everyday to clean the room & change towels, etc. breakfast was really good. The cook even packed breakfast for us when we were running late for our Pyrenees trip. Hotel is close to metro so it compensates the not so good location of this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Fergal M
Reviews.Content: This was a small hotel in Barcelona very close to Clot Metro and therefore in easy reach of great places to visit. The room was more than adequate for the price but the staff I have to say were very friendly, professional and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “A simple, modern hotel at a very good price”
Reviews.Author: Mitsos6
Reviews.Content: Visited Barcelona for a business meeting then stayed over for a few days on my own. Chose this hotel for its location and its price. The hotel is very conveniently situated, one block away from the Clot metro station, two blocks away from the Clot-Arago suburban train station, so commuting from/to the airport and the city center was really simple. The hotel staff is very polite, they speak very good English and they are eager to help. They were all cheerful, especially the night shift. My room (509) was very spacious with a large bathroom, overlooking the breakfast terrace, very quiet. LED lighting was a plus and gave the room a very modern look. Comfortable beds. Connecting to the Internet in my room however was impossible, so I had to run downstairs to connect. After complaining a few times, they finally moved me to a quite smaller room, overlooking the street. It was still quiet, so I didn't really mind. The wireless connection worked perfectly there. The breakfast buffet is simple but good, certainly worth it. Very good coffee. In general it's a simple, modern hotel at a very good price. Will definitely consider it again next time in Barcelona.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place to Stay!”
Reviews.Author: Dickens052
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here one night after departing from a cruise. We took a taxi to the hotel from the cruise terminal. The hotel is only one block from the Clot metro station. We were also able to take the train to the airport on the next morning. However one needs to be aware that there are 3 entrances to access Clot, and to catch the train one has to go to the furthest entrance. There is some construction at one of the entrances which I think makes this a bit more confusing. The hotel is in a quiet area. We were able to check our bags as we had arrived early from the cruise ship. Hotel personnel were friendly and helpful. However it would have been nice if we had been allowed to take a hotel towel to the beach. Breakfast was included in the price of the hotel. It was adequate. One nice feature at breakfast was that we enjoyed making our coffee and tea. The hotel is new. Our room was comfortable and roomy. The bathroom was large, very clean and had a great shower. We did not use the TV as one had to pay a deposit for the remote. We didn't want to be bothered as we found this out later on in the evening. The air conditioning didn't seem to be working correctly and would shut off after cooling the room to 25 even though it was set at 21. The hotel has free Wi-Fi. However if you don't have your own, be aware that there is a fee to use the hotel computer. It was explained to me by the front desk that the hotel doesn't own this computer service and it is like the vending machines. We used an internet cafe which was only one bock away as the rate at the hotel was high. The hotel is located in a quiet area but there are some restaurants near by. We felt safe and being close to the metro made it accessible to seeing the sights. The metro is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: “small concerns”
Reviews.Author: dmif
Reviews.Content: overall great experience, spotless rooms with a very crisp and modern feeling to them. the showers are amazingly large and the beds are really comfy as well. breakfast was delicious and there was an enormous variety as well. very pleased overall with the whole experience! Only concerns are the air conditioning, which is very slow in cooling down the room, in fact in a whole night it only cooled the room by 1degree (from 26 to 25), even though it was set to 19deg. the other minor problem was the lift, which took a bit too long to arrive from the other floors since this small hotel has only one lift to cater for everyone regarding noise, we were in a room overlooking the busy street below, but we found no problem sleeping and the noise level did not bother us either! on the whole... nicely done acta ink 606 ;)

Reviews.Title: “Good location, friendly staff, modern hotel, but noisy at times”
Reviews.Author: Ben82_11
Reviews.Content: The hotel had just opened a few months ago, and has a very modern and clean feel to it. The staff is friendly and helpful, they speak English (and Italian apparently) very well. Rooms are spacious and modern, free wi-fi is available, you just have to ask for the code at the reception desk. There is a supermarket right next door, a pharmacy across the street and some small bars/restaurants in the neighbourhood if you want a quick bite. Breakfast at the hotel costs 8 euros, which is a fair price. At the top floor, you have two modest sun decks, and on the lower floors a library and a snack area with vending machines. You receive a free map of Barcelona at check-in, but you don't need it to find the Sagrada Familia, which is only a 15min walk away. :-) A metro stop is also conveniently in the street behind the hotel. The only negative remark I have is that, if you have a room on the front side of the hotel, it can get noisy because of the traffic. The rooms aren't that soundproof, so if someone is talking in the hallway or when their door slams shut, it can wake you up at night. Overall, a very good hotel, great location, but not for the light sleeper.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient, clean and very modern”
Reviews.Author: shannonbananan1
Reviews.Content: I just came back from my four day trip to Barcelona and I stayed in this hotel. Overall, it was a good deal. The hotel is located in a suburban area, but is close to the Metro Station 'Clot'. So with this, it was very easy to get around. Plaça de Catalunya was only a couple stops away. The staff of the hotel were helpful, I was impressed with their ability to speak English, Italian, Spanish, and French. The breakfast was included and sufficient, nicely displayed. You also have the option of eating outside on the little patio. The only downside was the problems with the A/C. It'd work for about an hour or so, and then it would stop. This left us sweating at night. We told the receptionist, and he said that this was a problem throughout the hotel. And the tiny elevator.

Reviews.Title: “Very professional service”
Reviews.Author: scorpiolad
Reviews.Content: I stayed here with 2 friends for 3 days and I have to say I was very impressed by this hotel, in particular the professional attitude by the reception staff. They were all extremely friendly and helpful with any queries we had, in particular for directions and questions regarding tourist attractions.I would also definitely recommend this hotel for non spanish speaking visitors as all of the staff spoke English very well. This is a very modern hotel and therefore has a nice fresh feel about it. The beds were comfortable and we had a very good 'rain effect' shower, which is always a bonus after traipsing around the hot city for hours. Air con too.There was maid service with fresh towels each day. The only slight downside to the room was that it was a little small for 3 people as the third person has a sofa bed but for 2 people I'm sure would be adequate. We had breakfast in the hotel one day which was continental style self service. The quality was good and the quantity was impressive too. The only negative aspect is that this hotel isn't particularly central to most of the major sights. The Catalunya area seemed a very long walk, but there is a metro station close by which takes you there in around 4 stops. Overall a very good hotel and good value for money

Reviews.Title: “Very nice, modern hotel.”
Reviews.Author: rafalginko
Reviews.Content: Very clean and nice modern hotel, located near the subway. Helpful staff and a good breakfast that can be eaten at the terrace. Perfect place to stay in Barcelona.

Reviews.Title: “very comfortable hotel”
Reviews.Author: Azerbaijan84
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 4 nights in Acta Ink 606 hotel in Barcelona. It is quite new hotel, very comfortable and clean. There is a metro station near the hotel, it takes you 4-5 minutes on foot to get there. By metro you can go everywhere in Barcelona, to its sightseeings, to sea shore or to the airport and central station. The price of the hotel was rational. The staff was very helpful. We can with confidence recommend that hotel to those who are going to visit Barcelona .

Reviews.Title: “Almost no complaints about this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jensdm1986
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel for 3 nights while we were on a citytrip in Barcelona. We were welcomed very friendly by the staff of the hotel. We received our doorcard and got instructions on how tot move around Barca. The rooms were very large, modern and clean. There was also a safe which we could use for free. The bathroom had a large walk-in shower. The only notice here is that there were a bit problems with the water. The temperature of it changed all the time from cold to hot and back. It was nearly impossible to get a straight decent temperature from it. We have no further complaints about the room. We also had the breakfast included. This was very good and a lot of choice between several things. We would stay again in this hotel. Subway right around the corner. Safe neighbourhood and no noise from the streets at night.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, modern, safe area and overall very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: tourist_Specialist
Reviews.Content: I just came back from 4 nights in the hotel (June 2011). Stayed in room 404. The hotel is located 4 stops from Plaza Catalunya which is a main square in the city. The area is safe and quite (unlike the La Rambla area which is packed with tons of tourists and people, hence more noise and more sketchy people around). The room was very modern - huge comfortable bed, flat screen tv (spanish channels). Wifi in the room (had some problems for 2 days). the room is big, with a sofa and a closet (with safe box). the shower is big (no bath tub) and clean. Air conditioning was excellent. The room was very quite and i did not hear anything from the street nor from the hotel. The staff is speaking english and very nice. Breakfast - 7 Euro for breakfast between 7:30-10:30 , i did not try it but it looked ok - juice,coffee,eggs,sausage,cheese and bread. Overall i was very happy. I was looking for a nice clean place with quite rooms and i got what i was looking for.

Reviews.Title: “Okay if you don't want privacy”
Reviews.Author: Seasites
Reviews.Content: This relatively new hotel was good value for one night's stay although we found our room 203 had a fair amount of noise from the street. The hotel was located away from the sights but close to a metro stop. If you are sharing the room and want privacy in the bathroom this is not the hotel for you. The window in the shower provides a great view of the entire bathroom from the bedroom. The room was clean and reasonabily priced.. Dining options in the immediate area were limited. We did not have breakfast in the hotel so cannot comment on its quality.

Reviews.Title: “Design that might surprise you”
Reviews.Author: DanyaV
Reviews.Content: We've stayed in this hotel together with my friend for 6 days in May'11. We've selected this because we though that it is located close to Parc del Forum - the place where Primavera Sound music festival is located. First thing that might surprise you is design - all rooms are decorated with some conceptual picture. Every floor has its own concept. For example, we've stayed at "street art" floor in a room with pink Hitler photo. Location is nice - it's 15 minutes walking to Sagrada de Familia. And also it's close to Clot metro station from which you can go to the city center in 5 minutes. Rooms have no mini-bar or even water in it. But there is a cofee-machine located on the 4th floor. All the staff is friendly and very nice. We've delayed with check out and there were no any problems. I would not recommend this hotel to couples, but for company of friend it is quite ok.

Reviews.Title: “Well priced with wireless internet, very close to metro/train”
Reviews.Author: MurrayS4
Reviews.Content: Close to metro station Liceu with a direct connection with the airport by train. Wifi internet in the whole hotel, even at breakfast table. Small bathroom with no bath. Clean, modern and tidy with a good bed. Breakfast for EUR7 reasonable, pity there were no eggs. Friendly service in English. Quiet and safe suburb close to the Sagrada Familia.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: Fyien
Reviews.Content: My family of 4 stayed 6 nights in the hotel. We got a smaller room on the first night as it was fully booked. On the 2nd night onwards they gave us a much bigger and comfortable room for us. The room is clean and everything is new as this is a new hotel. Only setback is that it does not have a kettle in the room. It was troublesome for us as we had to make milk for our young kids so we had to fill up our thermos flask during breakfast. There is a direct train from airport to the clot station which is within walking distance to the hotel

Reviews.Title: “Spacious room in city location.”
Reviews.Author: ajaudet
Reviews.Content: this is a new hotel that opened on my first night stay. It is a good city location in Barcelona near the metro. It had a large comfortable bed in a spacious modern room. For a new hotel everything worked and the staff was very pleasant. A couple of improvements are the internet wireless strength needs to be increased. It was very slow and hard to connect to some sites or do work. The room could use some instructions on how to use the phone, TV, breakfast, etc. And the TV could use some international, english speaking in my case, stations.
